thread.title: Comment on Wireless Earbuds Charged Through Phone by faisal salman
thread.title_full: Comment on Wireless Earbuds Charged Through Phone by faisal salman

author: faisal salman
title: Comment on Wireless Earbuds Charged Through Phone by faisal salman
text:
Wireless Earbuds Charged Through Phone Posted September 1, 2015 
PUGZ are a wireless earphones that lets you charge them through a phone. You can listen and charge at the same time. 
You can also charge it in computer (USB), AC-adapter (USB), Android (uUSB) and iPhone (Lightning). 
By using 3% of your smart phone battery capacity to charge it you get 4,5 hours of music and 10 days of standby. 
You can choose in two in ear styles: Sealed provides you with a passive noise cancellation which isolates all surrounding noise. Leaking â€“ Our ear gel design directs the audio into your ear but lets you hear a bit of your surroundings. 
The sound ranges between 8Hz-28KHz giving a wide and deep bass without compromising to much on treble. The connection is made by Bluetooth 4.1 with a built in CSR-aptX chip. 
The project campaign is fully funded on the Kickstarter and reached its funding goal of $50.000, the early bird pricing are gone, but you can still get it for $119, an estimated delivery is on Nov of 2015.
